content:
Hey PA editors @Cooper Thompson , @Andrew Torres, @Simone Heckmann
Just ensuring that we're all working on the same set of trackers applying things to the spec.
GForge filter:

Status = resolved - change required
Reviewing workgroup = PA
Target Release = DSTURelease4

And so you know what I'm picking to apply, I'm going to do those with Group = 'B'
I applied ~20 tracker items last friday, mostly typos and everything where the disposition was clear to me
There is a link to a google doc in the PA skype chat on the Person introductory notes if you wanted to review the updated text there.
Thanks for the info. I emailed Lloyd to get committer privs today. Plan on working on trackers this week.
Well good thing I meant today and tomorrow by this week :-D
